apis.name: List protected branches
apis.description: Gets a list of protected branches from a project as they are defined in the UI. If a wildcard is set, it is returned instead of the exact name of the branches that match that wildcard.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Name or part of the name of protected branches to be searched for

apis.name: Get a single protected branch or wildcard protected branch
apis.description: Gets a single protected branch or wildcard protected branch.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the branch or wildcard

apis.name: Protect repository branches
apis.description: Protects a single repository branch or several project repository branches using a wildcard protected branch.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the branch or wildcard

attributes.name: push_access_level
attributes.description: Access levels allowed to push (defaults: 40, Maintainer role)

attributes.name: merge_access_level
attributes.description: Access levels allowed to merge (defaults: 40, Maintainer role)

attributes.name: unprotect_access_level
attributes.description: Access levels allowed to unprotect (defaults: 40, Maintainer role)

attributes.name: allow_force_push
attributes.description: Allow all users with push access to force push. (default: false)

attributes.name: allowed_to_push
attributes.description: Array of access levels allowed to push, with each described by a hash of the form {user_id: integer}, {group_id: integer}, or {access_level: integer}

attributes.name: allowed_to_merge
attributes.description: Array of access levels allowed to merge, with each described by a hash of the form {user_id: integer}, {group_id: integer}, or {access_level: integer}

attributes.name: allowed_to_unprotect
attributes.description: Array of access levels allowed to unprotect, with each described by a hash of the form {user_id: integer}, {group_id: integer}, or {access_level: integer}

attributes.name: code_owner_approval_required
attributes.description: Prevent pushes to this branch if it matches an item in the CODEOWNERS file. (defaults: false)

apis.name: Unprotect repository branches
apis.description: Unprotects the given protected branch or wildcard protected branch.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

apis.name: Require code owner approvals for a single branch
apis.description: Update the “code owner approval required” option for the given protected branch.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: code_owner_approval_required
attributes.description: Prevent pushes to this branch if it matches an item in the CODEOWNERS file. (defaults: false)
